description: References: PWGSC Supply Arrangement No.: EN578-170432. RFP Number 6000597878
full_summary:
===============

Title
-----

TBIPS – Intermediate System Administrator (Secret Security Level)
--------------------------------------------------------

### Publication Details

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01030610
**Solicitation Number**: 6000597878
**Publication Date**: March 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 6, 2023 (12:00 PM ET)

Summary
--------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide Intermediate System Administration Services with a Secret Security Level. This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the TBS Information Technology Shared Services (TBIPS) Contract.

Contract Details
----------------

*   **Contract Type**: Labour Services
*   **Contract Category**: Service Contract
*   **End Date**: May 24, 2023 (Contract Duration: 21 Days)

Scope of Work
-------------

The contractor will provide System Administration Services for a period of 21 days, starting from April 24, 2023. The contractor will work on-site and perform system administration tasks as required by the client.

Evaluation Criteria
------------------

Please refer to the Request for Proposal document for evaluation criteria and requirements.

How to Respond
----------------

To respond to this Request for Proposal, please submit your proposal electronically to the Canada.CanadaB Buy Electronic Tenders website.

Proposal Documents
-------------------

The following documents are available for download:

*   RFP Document (English)
*   RFP Document (French)
*   Government of Canada’s Contract Security Regulations

Delivery
--------

The delivery address for the proposal is:

 Ministry of Defence
 Electronic Procurement
 (not specified some contract delivery details)

Additional Information
----------------------

For more information, please visit the Canada.Canada B Buy Electronic Tenders website. You can also contact Alain at 613-992-7715 or Alain.Pothier@forces.gc.ca.

[Source of Document](link to source of document) In Response to This Notice, any representations may be sent to the contracting authority, no later than 30 days after the closing date of the notice is cited.
